formatted_address: 80 Marine Parade Road #05-04/05 Parkway Parade Medical Centre (Parking at, Level 4 Singapore Access to Medical Centre from Level 4 near My First Skool, Singapore 449269
name: Zest Clinic

reviews.text:
Had a great experience at Zest Clinic.
Mikayla was very friendly, professional & knowledgeable. She was very helpful and was me all the way through when I had some issues. Doctor was very friendly and professional. Zest clinic has a wide variety of treatments that suits my needs. Overall great experience

I recently visited Zest Clinic for a ESWT consultation, clinic itself is clean and aesthetically pleasing, The staffs were helpful and accommodative. Was in the good hands of the doctor , not only professionals but also took the time to thoroughly explain every detail of the procedure, addressing all my concerns. I felt completely at ease and comfortable.

I went to the Zest Clinic today to schedule a mole removal appointment. Staff member Sherry gave me a warm welcome. The other team members, Carmen and Olivia, have taken good care of me. They often serve with a cheer up and are extremely courteous. I am grateful to Dr. Tifanny Teo for providing thorough explanations before to the laser operation. She always has a smile on her face and is very understanding of my demands. The teams are awesomes.

I've done several treatments at Zest, and have only had positive experiences. Dr. Reddy is professional and always makes time for my questions, and the bubbly staff are super friendly, attentive and create a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Most importantly, I've seen great results in the areas I've focused on (Men's health and skincare).  Would highly recommend Zest to anyone!

Recently went to zest clinic for dark eye circles remover. The overall experience was great.
Mikayla and Edrea are accommodating, friendly ,patient and professional making the whole process more comfortable and smooth

Doctor Reddy is very professional and highly knowledgeable in aesthetic

highly recommended
